Package com.example.omrifit.adapters

Class MuscleAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MuscleAdapter.MuscleViewHolder>
com.example.omrifit.adapters.MuscleAdapter
public class MuscleAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<MuscleAdapter.MuscleViewHolder>
RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a list of Muscle objects.
